name: Sphere Shooter
description:
Sphere Shooter is a very challenging game where you objective is to get to the end of the level by shooting obstacles and enemies trying to kill you.

With 6 levels so far, the game brings a good experience as the difficulty of the levels grows together with the player skill, combining jumping, hiding and shooting.

By buying this game, you are helping on the development of SuperHero Simulator, an open-world game also made by 2k16.

Follow me on twitter for news and stuff.
